column5: 2015. retired from ross labs. member of spring road church of christ; veteran of u. s. navy
column6: world war ii. preceded in death by parents john and eunice gaskalla and brother charles. survived by loving wife of 64 years
column8: mary jo gaskalla of lewis center; and brother
column9: lanny (carol) gaskalla of columbus; several nieces and nephews. friends may call at the moreland funeral home
column13: where service will be held 10:30 a. m. monday
column16: clay brown and robin weir officiating. interment forest lawn memorial park. friends
column18: may contribute to spring road church of christ or willow brook christian home.
